one day you wake up to your parents waking u up with your little sis and bro, when your wake up your parents say" were going away for a bit so your in charge for the next week."

parents" your heard your in charge"
you"what for real"
parents "yes"
your dad then looks at his watch and says" were going to be late"
mum" right you r, youll be ok wont you looking after them"
you "yes mum we'll be fine wont we" say hugging your bro and sis
mum "if not your auntie said shell pop round half way through the week to see how u are"
you and sis and bro "we'll be fine"
dad "they'll be fine now we got to go"
your mum kisses you "now you be good for you older bro/sis"
and then they leave.

you tell your bro and sis to go down stairs to get breakfast while you get dressed. so they run down stairs and start to get breakfast ready. you get ready and head down stairs to the living room where they are watching T.V.
